website_summaries.verdict: Attractively priced and full of great features, the PS3 Wireless Headset provides above-average sound quality and hassle-free performance.
pros: The PS3 Wireless Headset is incredibly easy to use, sports an intelligent design, and is comfortable for hours of gaming
cons: We wish the PS3 Wireless Headset had an adjustable boom mic (instead of just telescoping) and a longer battery life
Also, the virtual surround sound effect isn't worth using
It would have been nice for Sony to include a cheap USB charging cable as well

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable headset for PS3 or PS4!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this headset exclusively for my PS3 and PS4. Good battery life(rechargeable) and always has great sound and changing settings for voice/chat, volume, mute, and Virtual Surround is flawlessly easy while still wearing headset! I've also used a OTG cable with a Samsung Galaxy Note 3 and ZTE Axon 7 with this headset for listening to music or while watching movies from these phones, sound is rich, clear, and not distorted...A must have for anyone with a PSN habit and more!
customer_reviews.author: Justin P.

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: This headset was really good besides the defect I had so returning them. I replaced it with astro a40 tr. The reason i'm not getting a replacement is because all audio goes through usb to the headset. So you can't have tv audio. I also record my game plays so this is a big issue. With Astro a40 tr I can record chat and audio fine. I really liked the separate volume rockers for chat and audio. I paid $175 for this product in 2019. It definitely is not worth $175. That is why I gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Average sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive these as this is the first time in my life i get to hear my playstation games with headphones(plus from what i understand this is the ONLY pair of wireless headphones that work with the ps3) but i was underwhelmed by the sound quality, probably because of the wireless transmitter not being the best quality for sound nonetheless it has many features. These are hard to find and cost a boat load of $$$ so i decided to keep them either way
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: They're comfortable and the sound quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Mine are factory refurbished. The headphones, wireless adapter (USB), and instructions were individually plastic-sealed. Everything is clean, working, and in new condition with no signs of previous use. I'm not sure what the maximum range is, but I can walk around my apartment and go in different rooms, and I can hear and be heard very well with no loss of quality. Out of the box, they only took a couple of hours to fully charge. They're comfortable and the sound quality is great. But do make sure to read the instructions carefully and note that the power button is also the mute button for the microphone when pressed again while the headphones are on.
customer_reviews.author: MostlyPonies

customer_reviews.title: ultimate gamer must
customer_reviews.text: If you take your video game playing seriously, this is for you,the ultimate. State of the art audio communication. It is top of the line headset for Playstation 3. Its all they advertise 7.1 surround sound,very high audio quality for group communication, high quality voice chats,volume control,retractable microphone,wireless adapter included,onscreen headset updates, you can actually hear the enemy before seeing him,really cool. Can also be used for watching movies,puts you in a world all your own,just you and the movie, battery lasts a long time. Highly recommended,don't settle for anything less,this is it. Sony's products are always one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Jacket

customer_reviews.title: 6 Years still rocking it
customer_reviews.text: I had to write a review after using these daily for the past 6 years. The sound quality is very good. The battery life is starting to show. I get around 4 hours of use before I need to plug them in. They have survived longer then my PS3. I use them for PC now on windows 10. Gaming and discord use is perfect. After about 6 hours of use they start to rub on my ears a bit. The leather on the ear cups wore off last year but the padding is still good.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Spies

customer_reviews.title: pros 6 years later still sound great I bought this to use with my ps3
customer_reviews.text: pros 6 years later still sound great I bought this to use with my ps3, but i now use it on my computer for chatting in games and being able to listen to my music and the game without effecting the mic the battery last a while it looks like you have mini ps3 on each ear cons they would look sick white
customer_reviews.author: Bon G. Ripper

customer_reviews.title: Improves awareness while gaming, sometimes loses connection though
customer_reviews.text: I use this for gaming and this headset works very well. The sound is clear and you can easily identify which direction sounds are coming from. Great to improve awareness, gamers will definitely have an advantage with their awareness using this headset. The only negative I have about this headset is it frequently loses its connection. This is frustrating as it takes about 30 seconds to restart the headset and get a connection again. I didn't seem to have a problem with interference from Wi-Fi or other Bluetooth devices, but maybe it was because of those? Once connected again it seemed to work fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great for PS3
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, must-buy if you want a wireless headset designes for your PS3. Mine has been workint flawlessly for the past 5 years. Battery life isn't the greatest, but if you burn through a full charge in one sitting, your eyes probably need some rest anyway!
customer_reviews.author: EETJSki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 👍😁
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a early Xmas gift to make sure it worked. Took some time to figure out how to turn it on. No manual came with it. Works great! Way better then my radio transmitter head set.
customer_reviews.author: Keith N.

customer_reviews.title: 20 feet range
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price. Granted, for audiophiles there's much better out there but these still hold their ground for the price you pay and the quality they offer. Pros: Great build quality. Great sound and design. Comfortable for long hours. Cons: Not very good range. Disconnects instead of readjusting when signal is weak in about 20 feet. So this is not very good for VOIP purposes. Besides, it's uncomfortable chatting when you can't hear yourself speak with headphones that seal your ears. The logitech H760s that I've owned for over a year now, are considerably better with range and pretty much set the standard for wireless freedom imo but those are not very comfortable for longer hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mace Vindaloo

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, You really should buy them even if you don't have a PS3.
customer_reviews.text: This review is going to be pretty straight foward. I'll try to resume everything in positive and negative aspects of this product. Pros: -Fast SetUp. -Long Range (10m or 33ft). -Good padding in ears and headbands. -Intuitive and easily accesible controls. -Medium to high quality sound. -Great value. -Works with your Mac, using OS X Lion, OS X Mountain Lion and up. -Recharges Fast. Cons: -Battery doesn't last long with high volume. -Microphone it's only telescopic so it can't bend to be near your mouth. -Microphone has feedback. (You hear yourself.) -Doesn't have good sound insolation.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Arias

customer_reviews.title: Ok as long as you don't wear glasses
customer_reviews.text: As for the quality of the product, it is hard to beat Sony. Everything about the headset is very solid, great quality and the sound is fantastic. But unfortunately if you are a eye glass wearer, after an hour of wearing the headset... The headset would have pushed your glasses arms against the side of your head which will create discomfort and aggravation. I don't recommend this product for glasses wearers, otherwise, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge's Amazon

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are exactly what I hoped they would be. They flawlessly integrate with my PS3 (thankfully being the that they're made for this purpose), and the on screen updates when you perform some action are very nice. The battery lasts for a very respectable amount of time, and I've never had a problem with it running out. The only problem battery wise is that it doesn't come with a charging cord (you're supposed to use the one that came with the PS3 to charge your controllers), and thus in order to charge the headset you have to leave the PS3 turned on.
customer_reviews.author: John Carter

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected (comfort & sound).
customer_reviews.text: Not audiophile, but definitely $100 sound quality. I bought this headset to replace the ghastly PS3 BLUETOOTH EARPIECE (unstable, uncomfortable, & short battery life). This headset is infinitely better. Game & VOIP is clear. I haven't lost connection to VOIP yet & I've never depleted the battery with hours & hours of use between charging. It's also VERY comfortable with thick, plastic-framed glasses (so long as they don't stick out behind the ear AT ALL). I am annoyed that it doesn't come with a USB charger. The mic picks up wind & other ambient sounds. I remedied the "AC vent" sound using a small windscreen (slightly larger than a lapel mic). Overall, I highly recommend this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Cielo Perso

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: Wireless? Check. Works on PS3? Check. Works on my PC? Check. Works on my Macbook Pro? Check. The mic is crystal clear and I love how you can adjust the sound ratio between game sounds and voice chat (although I think this only works when connected to the PS3). The sound quality is really good for my tastes. They fit comfortably over my ears, and they even cancel out about 60-70% of the noise at my house. Be advised, though, that it does NOT come with a charging cable, as Sony expects you to use the USB cable you probably use to charge your controllers with. This wasn't an issue for me, but just throwing it out there.
customer_reviews.author: Henry R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever for my PS3. Pro: Works as described. Separate controls for game/chat USB Rechargeable USB Powered if the battery dies. Can be used on PCs Cons: The USB dongle is mated to the headset. If you damage it, the headset is useless and you CAN NOT get a replacement Volume, Seems a little on the low side. Could use a little bit more power the Boom Mic seems a little goofy, I would love it if I got the newer version of these with the mic in the ear cup. But I do love this headset and I have no intention of replacing it til;l it fails.
customer_reviews.author: GunDeck

customer_reviews.title: It works for games, not so much for movies....
customer_reviews.text: When it works it works fine, but even with Sony games like Uncharted, it will break up connection every few minutes, I think its like every 15 minutes but can't be sure, it breaks up a few seconds and then comes back. I'm not the only reviewer that noticed this, so its clearly some hardware or software bug, which cannot keep up the buffering or processing for long periods. For movies or streaming it will not work at all, it affects the Wifi on the playstation for some reason so your Internet connection will not work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Good for gaming
customer_reviews.text: These are great for gaming and sync with the PS3 with no problem with the included usb connector. I imagine they would work with any other digital device, such as a computer, that has a USB port, although I haven't tried. The sound quality is no Bose or Sennheiser... but it's good enough as long as you're not an audio snob (audiophile?). Anyway, you're getting good enough, wireless quality with these headphones. Also, they keep from from driving my wife crazy with video game noise, haha. Also, I am quite impressed with the simulated surround sound. I prefer to play with the headphones on, because the sound is much better than what comes from my TV.
customer_reviews.author: leecountyhokie

customer_reviews.title: these are the best sony gaming headset out of the 3 pair of sony's I own
customer_reviews.text: all I can say is they don't make em like this anymore they sound the best and are indestructible I still have my original pair and they still work great but I wanted a backup pair and you can look anywhere else and you will not find a better deal than these here (trust me I left no stone unturned) and they arrived looking brand new with dongle and charging cable I am seriously thinking about getting another to store away just sayin!!
customer_reviews.author: SangReal_V_

customer_reviews.title: amazing headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my son after doing some research on them. The reviews were very helpful. The item is of great quality. The sound will blow you away. They are awesome. The adjustment levels are of superior quality. They don't make you sweat like others. You can use them up to 8 hours on maximum charge. The surround sound is virtual but still amazing. They are light weight and comfortable. Even though they state that they are only for ps3 , you can use them with other devices that have a usb connection. I would definitely recommend them to other people......
customer_reviews.author: Honesty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. Great sound. I read alot of reviews about these headphones before buying themand the one thing that stands out the most is what people say about the simulated surround sound. Of course it's not real cause this would require at least five speakers. I use them for gaming. Mostly Kill Zone 3. I can hear guys coming from any angle with no problem. The sound on these is great. Powerfully bass rich treble. I do have a problem with them cutting out every once and a while but, I think this is more due to my neighbors wireless router. They're very comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: David Stokes

customer_reviews.title: pretty awesome for the price.
customer_reviews.text: in case anyone's wondering, this works with pc as well as ps3. (mic works on pc too) very good audio quality overall. love being able to charge through usb. wish it came with a cable. build quality is okay. i like the metal band but the mic is super flimsy. luckily it tucks away. very comfortable. i can wear these for hours without problems. really wish it had a 3.5 mm audio jack so i could use them with my phone. probably will be upgrading to the pulse edition sometime. minor complaint: i wish there was an indicator light to tell whether it was on stereo or surround.
customer_reviews.author: acondie13

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and nice sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable with the oversize ear piece. my ears doesn't feel pressed or anything. The padding is soft as well. The whole headphone is fairly light as well, it feels very comfortable. The only bad thing I can thing of is the squeakiness of the build. Its okay once you had it settle down on your head and doesn't move. But while adjusting or put it on, you gets a feeling that this thing might breaks anytime soon. So far it hasn't after 2+ years of medium use. Guess thats the trade off between sturdiness and weight. But so far, I very much like it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Joseph Li

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded
customer_reviews.text: I started out with the small, single ear blue tooth Playstation headset that came with the Socom game about three years after the Playstaion 3 was released. This is a HUGE improvement. The audio is amazing, the headset fits comfortably, the controls are simple and sleek, the audio is clear, and it's simply the best bang for your buck. I'd suggest this to anyone who plays online with friends for hours at a time. With friends that live in other states, sometimes playing video games are the only way you and your friend can do something together, and this helps out a LOT.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Best headset I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for years not and no wireless/blu tooth headset I have had in the past even comes close to the quality of this. My voice comes over clear on the mic and my games some in as surround sound. It fits over my ears and is very comfortable to ware. The battery lasts for about 4 - 5 hrs of game play after that you can plug it in to a USB port or charger and keep using it. There is an even better version of this out now. I will diffidently get it once and of this head set ever dies. Also I am using this on my PC (win7), I don't even own a ps3.
customer_reviews.author: Xephon

customer_reviews.title: Great PS3 Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was researching headphones for a while before I finally settled on something specifically for the PS3 and I have not been disappointed at all. The sound is great, the wireless connection is simple to setup and then reconnecting headphones is as simple as turning them on. The mic can be retracted if you don't need it and the volume slide bar is accessible but sometimes a little tough to move small increments. The ear phones themselves are also very comfortable and they fit my head nicely (and I have a big head so that was a worry). Great product
customer_reviews.author: R. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Headset!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with these wireless headset. They have a nice looking design that looks durable. The blue led status indicator on the mic part is cool and lets you see the status on your headset. Also it does a quick pairing once you connect it to the PS3 and turn it on, no need to do any extra configurations. I used to own the TB PX21 but didn't use them that much because of the long cords in the way of my living room. Now that I got these I can game @ night and wont disturb anybody. I totally Recommend it to anyone. Its nice, it has great sound and its Sony!
customer_reviews.author: Jhon & Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!! Great Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a great wireless headset at a great price! Insert the USB drive, press the power button / mic for a sec and Voila! This headset is light and very comfortable. I don't think it looks cheap like some mentioned. Easy to use also. Every controls are on the left, master volume, sound voice, suround on/off & mic mute or unmute. Really easy solution for those like me that can't enjoy a great surround sound for your gaming/movies without disturbing or waking up the wife, well that's the best option. I've tested the 2.0 and the 5.1/7.1 surround. Both sound great! Voice chat is clear too. higly recommennded!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best headset I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best headset I've ever owned. That is why I purchased it again after my original set plain wore out. They sound and hold a charge better than headsets that are way more expensive. I can easily plug the dongle into my laptop while streaming movies/videos and they work effortlessly. They arrived Brand New and Factory sealed. Will amend review if I have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset!
customer_reviews.text: Recently, I moved into a dorm with another roommate, and these help me play my games without disturbing him. The sound on these are great, and sound even better than my turtle beach p11s. I was considering getting the elite edition of this headset, but since I was only going to use these on my ps3 since I had Beats for on the go sound, I decided to go with this cheaper 80 dollar version. Another reason I was going to get the Elite edition was for the pulse feature, but later heard that it actually makes games sound worse and clunky. Anyways, this is a great headset for ps3 use as it is wireless, sounds great, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Sun

customer_reviews.title: Was Great, Better Alternatives Now
customer_reviews.text: This was my first great headset when I was a kid and it lasted for years, just retiring within the last few months. I bought this bad boy back on December 26, 2011 for $79.99 and now it is shamefully $149.99. There are better value options available such as the Hyper X line of headsets which I highly recommend both for the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rozak

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Can you hear footsteps? Yes. I hear too many footsteps actually. Most of them in first person shooters are the enemy's footsteps right before they kill me. That aside, this is a very good product in my opinion. I play all my games and watch most movies while wearing them. I played L.A. Noire with them and i could hear conversations happening in the street while i was inside the police building. They work, and like some reviews mention, they are not audiophile material but they give awesome results. i Don't regret having purchased them. Nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shikigami78

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Easy use. Great quality. Do even try to game online without great headphones. You won't believe what you were missing once you get yourself a great pair and these are top notch. Ever wonder how some players seem to always know when you are sneaking up to quick scope or knife them? Well, turn out THEY CAN HEAR YOU COMING! Make it a fair fight with these great wireless headphones. An added bonus, if you listen to music on your Playstation these things can really deliver crisp, clean music too!
customer_reviews.author: American SquirtGuns

customer_reviews.title: A great gaming headset, much improved over the old earpiece one.
customer_reviews.text: There's a generic in-ear sony headset you can buy - don't! These cans are much better. They fit snuggly completely around the ear and the battery charge is long-lasting. The sounds are clear and I love the volume controls. I do dislike not hearing my own voice, but that is the only gripe I have, minor at best. If you love PS3 gaming then you can't go wrong with these. EDIT: I should point out the USB connection on my headset is very sensitive. If the cable isn't plugged in just right, the connection is cut, and the device won't charge.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm wireless
customer_reviews.text: Been about a month that I've had it. The audio obviously doesn't compare to my polk audio 5.1 surround sound system, but after getting used to it, I can't live without it. No more blaring the sound to hear everything. In fact I hear more than I did before, both in games and netflix/hulu/etc. Very comfortable for long gaming sessions, and it's wireless which was exactly what I wanted. Not to mention I got it refurbished for ~$60, best purchase I've made all year in my opinion. Syncs with ps3 with ease, plug and play. I'm sure there's better sounding headphones(there always is) but im very very very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda'sbest

customer_reviews.title: Just would like to say these are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just would like to say these are awesome. My PlayStation gold headset just snapped. Crappy plastic headband. The metal headband on these still going strong. Plugged back in and after not being charged for 2 plus years still at 75 percent battery after 2 hrs. Also I almost think the sound quality is better.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Kavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for PS3
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this with the PS3. It is simply a case of plugging the usb stick into the PS3, charging the headset and that is it. Well integrated to show volume, battery level etc on screen when you alter anything, clear sound, and speech, and very comfortable. My kids 10 and 8 mainly use the headset for their games and the battery lasts a good few hours as i only charge it once a week. Last weekend they had friends over and taking turns, the headset lasted approx 6 hours straight before it needed charging with intensive play on a Call of Duty game.
customer_reviews.author: Nutner

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones for the PS3
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son to use. He's been looking for some headphones to use in place of just using a bluetooth to talk. Looked at a few of the big name (turtle beach, etc.) and though they make some great headphones, you'd have to spend twice as much to get quality WIRELESS ones. Hard to go wrong with Sony products in regards to working well with their intended use (PS3). No compatibility issues, instant recognition when you turn it on, sound quality is loud and clear. If you're looking for a quality, wireless PS3 headset, this purchase is a NO BRAINER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kragbax

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend who plays a lot of COD Black Ops 2. He likes it loud, but we live in a studio apartment, so the noise was just a little hard to deal with while I'm trying to do homework. Anyway, I gave him these last week, and he has been on Cloud Nine ever since. He loves the volume control on the headset, and says that the sound on the headphones is much clearer through them than through the TV. He is very impressed with these and they have helped me to win Girlfriend of The Century, so yes- these were a fantastic purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Miss G

customer_reviews.title: Great headset value
customer_reviews.text: I won't rehash in great detail what's been said about the few negatives. Doesn't have huge, ballsy bass and the ear cups do get toasty. But this is a really great headset for the money, with realistic sound reproduction and incredibly light considering what's packed in here. And the real topper is the thin wedge USB dongle instead of some massive base station to try to stick somewhere. I got just about the advertised distance of 33ft or a little more and behind doors before it cut out. All in all, I'm loving this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Voltaire

customer_reviews.title: Wow...Its a Great product !
customer_reviews.text: To tell you the truth I was not expecting alot out of this product with Sony's rather half hearted attempts at ingame chat. Have said that, I could not be more pleased with this new first party "Sony Product". Quality is really great and the dynamic audio is amazing. It brings an entire new intensity to online multiplayer and total emmersion to the single player aspect of any game your playing....especially Resistence 3! Id put this product up to any wireless headset on the market. IE: I have a Turtle Beach headset for my 360 and this product puts it to shame.......hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Sounds

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I use this headset with just about any audio device which accepts Bluetooth around the house besides the PS3 & simply can't be beat,especially with it's generous price offering.May not be for the critical high end audiophiles,but then one should settle for the wired masterpiece headphones out there,but this headset still exceeds many good ones out there.The ergonomics & fit is easy & comfortable.The surround sound feature seriously works. Highly recommend another Sony marvel.
customer_reviews.author: XDS3:14

customer_reviews.title: In with the new
customer_reviews.text: I used to own the first ps3 earpiece, but it hurt my ear, and sometimes wouldn't hold a charge; so I sold it and got the turtle beach P21 for a lot of money. The turtle beach had a cord and the first one was defective right out of the box. Sounded great, but the cord kept me away from it. Now, finally, Sony came through. The best of the best for PS3 gaming, and not bad at all for movies. I was surprised by the clarity, bass, and battery life. I play for 1-2 hours an evening almost everyday, and I only needed to charge it about every 10-12 days. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer49

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headset for Playstation!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Dad because I have a pair just like them and I love them SO much. They have surround-sound effect and volume control. They're comfortable, and have a good range. The sound quality is very clear for chat and movies/games/music. These are well worth the money. I got them to use with my PS3 about 3 years ago and I now have a PS4 and they work on the PS4, too. I wear them when I work out on my treadmill, too. I can't say enough good things about this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Allie8962

customer_reviews.title: Sony Wireless Stereo Headset
customer_reviews.text: This headphone can be listened to in surround sound mode which is quite good and works flawlessly with the PS3. Also it can be set for stereo mode. These headphones are very comfortable and well suited for extended gaming sessions or movie viewing. They take a few hours to recharge after about 6 hours of use. The mike is unused but, presumably, works just as well as the earphones which are very good and exhibit no unwanted qualities. The Amazon description of these headphone is accurate an I recommend them without hesitation for their intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase - Sony Wireless Stereo Headset - PS3
customer_reviews.text: As I am not the one that uses this Sony Wireless Headset, I really cannot say much more than what I am told by the person who does use it (teenager). *Apparently, they are the best thing since apple pie. Superb sound. *Rugged too, as he does not treat them with the utmost care. *Long battery life. *Some leakage, sound wise, when he has the volume too high. Another Sony headset that we are absolutely happy with and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: online for everything

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are terrific. They allow me to game after everyone in the house has gone to bed, and many times I use them simply because they sound so fantastic. Chat and game sounds can be set to your liking. You can hook them up to your laptop to listen to music, which I do often. They are comfortable to wear for hours, and you can wear regular eye glasses with 3D glasses without any issues. The only negative I see with these is that the battery lasts probably about 4-5 hours, meaning you'll be charging them often, but its worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Hop Love

customer_reviews.title: It's like being in the game
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting these because my gaming area is not too far from the living room and I don't want the sound of the games overriding other people's viewing of the tv and sound in the living. Plus, sometimes I play games with swearing and I try not to have my kids too much of that. These are better than perfect. They allow me to get fully emersed in the game with surround sound, while not interfering with the rest of my family's entertainment (great for playing at night while everyone is trying to sleep as well). Anyone, who is thinking of getting these, should do it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Robbert

customer_reviews.title: Used Everyday... A little too much
customer_reviews.text: Bought for nephew as gift. The kid uses them 3 hours a day. He batteries last for his use. They sound amazing. I'm a freak for great sound and was worried due to the price. Felt my nephew wouldn't care because he is a kid. I was blown away by what you get to hear when you game. Best part about these headphones is they are designed for the PS3. No wires or worries of connection issues. They are a must if you want to place in silence and communicate with your nerdy friends while gaming.
customer_reviews.author: balln2k9

customer_reviews.title: These are phenominal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of headphones. They sycn to your PS3 almost instantaneously, they are very comfortable, wireless, and might as well be noise cancelling, because with the right mix (adjustible by the headphones) you gan get emersed into a game, and the voice net is actually pretty good. Mine has had issues once in a while (less than 10% of the time) where something doesnt seem right in the volume, etc, and I have to reset it, or the PS3... but it's rare. That is the only reason I dinged it a star.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am new to online gaming and am hooked on modern warfare. I get home from work at 0300 and like to play a few rounds without waking my family. After reading many positive reviews about this product i decided to try them out. For under 100 bucks these headphones are extremely lightweight and comfortable and the sound is AMAZING!! The first time I used them I was literally shaking in my chair, completely immersed in the battle. Surely there are better more expensive wireless headphones on the market but for the money these are just fine and dandy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo J. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great Sony Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headset because its lightweight and is very comfortable. I am not a sound guru so I can't speak to all of that, but I will say that this headset does well in online gaming and you will have no problems hearing game sound/team mates speaking. Also, at times I think that the sound could be better, but it could just be my settings. For the price this headset is a good deal, and I think any average gamer with definitely be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Best Headset I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: This headset works with both the Playstation 3 and my computer. Talking on skype has never been more convenient, and the audio quality from my favorite video games is superb. I do have a few complaints, though nothing major. First, the absolute minimum volume is much louder than I would prefer. You get used to it, but I do wish there was a softer setting. Second, I had originally bought this hoping it would work for the PS4 (before headset compatibility was announced). It currently does not; however there are rumors that it will be patched in the future. Overall, great headset.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Can't use while charging
customer_reviews.text: These would be great except for the extremely poor battery life. Frustrating that they seem to use power faster than they can be charged. Literally. They will die. Plug them into the charger and try to use them while they're plugged in and charging . . . they will still die. And they won't work at all until there's significant charge built up . . . only to die once again before you're done gaming. I understand we're in the age of wireless and that's cool, but not even having the option of using something while it's plugged in when it's out of juice--that's the opposite of convenience. Inexcusable flaw.
customer_reviews.author: adhoclobster

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good solution for ps3
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good wireless headset solution for the ps3 for a few years, and didn't like any of the ones that used a base station (some were nice, just really expensive). When sonly came out with an officially supported headset that actually did in game sound and chat instead of the crappy bt earpiece i had been using, i jumped on it. The sound quality and range are good, battery life is ok, wish it was a little longer. Not bad for the money for a factory type solution.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Only One Complaint ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, super annoyed that I couldn't use two wireless sets at the same time, and it doesn't tell you that anywhere in the product description. I didn't figure out what was wrong until I trolled the forums for a while ... Other than that, the babies survived the trip to and from Afghanistan, and everything in between. I give the product two thumbs up, but this single-use issue seems like a bit of a "WTF, Captain Obvious" flaw on Sony's part ....
customer_reviews.author: Jayn3Wayn3

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: these headphones were a snap to set up all you do is plug it in and it works, they sound better then my turtle beach px21 and they also are the most comfortable headphones I ever owned. I get really bad headaches from things like hats and glasses being on my head but I can not feel these also I have a really big head (I'm 6'4) and they put no pressure on my head...also your my ear gets completly surrounded by the headphone which is really cool
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Still have them still work. The material on the headphones is coming off but had these for years. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband's birthday for his PS3. They arrived on time and in excellent condition. So far he likes them. I like them because they don't have a wire hanging down on the floor. We were somewhat disappointed that the charging adapter was not included. He was able to use the adapter for the PS3 controller but it would be nice to have two in case they both need charging at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headset w/ great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headset. It is really comfortable and the sound quality is awesome. The surround sound and bass effects far exceeded my expectations. The fact that it works with Netflix and other video services, as well as your music, is great. I would definitely recommend this for anyone looking for a headset for the PS3, especially to people whose girlfriends/family members are always asking them to turn it down. Update* I am loving the fact that these seem to work with any PC/laptop. I've been using these recently with Battlefield 3 on my i7 rig and the surround sound is fantastic. These continue to impress.
customer_reviews.author: Monkdog

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: I guess I was expecting a little bit more, but after reviewing the pricetag, I got to my senses and discover that is a pretty decent quality for the price paid... Run time is still something that can be improved, I guess the next gen Pulse had that sorted out, with better battery life, I just did not have the budget to get a pair of those... Cristal Clear chatting, decent surround (not the best) and good power, I would definitively recommends... PD: you look pretty bad-ass with those one too...
customer_reviews.author: Reinaldo J. Ballestero

customer_reviews.title: Sony creates amazing product
customer_reviews.text: These wireless headphones are absolutely amazing and crystal clear. You can converse with people from all over the world. If Sony can do this, why can't they make our cellphones clearer? I've had this product over a year and it still looks brand new and performs brilliantly with my PS3. You can use it on the playstation network or for games or to watch Netflix movies without disturbing others. It gives you a surround sound experience that is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Snax McLovin

customer_reviews.title: PROBLEM ! read this
customer_reviews.text: yes.. these headpones are A M A Z I N G . i promise. algo amazing for listening to music in your computer or whatever. and YES the Voice Chat is 'Crystal Clear' but. i have 100% interference issues with my Wi-Fi internet. the ps3 and these ON = internet OFF. yes it has a solution, changing your router signal channel, or.. getting a usb hud/extension, and maybe other weird solutions. i repeat, these headphones are awesome, but u'll find as many reviews about the interference issues.
customer_reviews.author: L T

customer_reviews.title: One big problem - otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sound is great - especially the virtual 7.1 Charges relatively fast Looks very sleek and good - Especially with a headphone stand. Cons: Makes weird popping noises and interference when the wireless controller isn't plugged in and charging, which is a HUGE upset. Would be 5 stars if not for this problem. Battery dies pretty quickly when switched on to 7.1 virtual surround sound, pretty stable with 5.1 though. (And they don't sound THAT much different.)
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these headphones they can't be beat. They can be worn for hours at a time without any discomfort and the sound quality is very good. When I'm not using these to game I use Bose QC15s to listen to music. Yeah, there are audio equipment snobs out there that will go on forever talking about mids, highs, lows and frequency response and that's not me. But I can't think of a single complaint about these headphones. They are the single best PS3 accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Ed MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Surround sound is great, headset works effectively! Couldn't be happier with the product. I have a big head, and it is adjustable and fits comfortably. If you don't rest the instructions it would be worthwhile to note that the power button is the three dots on the side panel. You need to push it down to get it to turn on. there is not visible "button" Overall 10/10
customer_reviews.author: NJW

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones will block out any outside noise and are very comfortable to wear. You don't need to just use them for gaming but that is what i mostly use them for. The controls work great and i love how them deigned them to be used. Microphone sound goes through the game amazing as does the sound coming through the ear pieces themselves. A little on the high side for a pair of gaming headphones, but worth it and I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Young NYer 10

customer_reviews.title: You won't believe your ears!!!!
customer_reviews.text: never knew how much sound I was missing in my video games until I got these. I had never even heard half the sounds of my game! Surround sound is great. Good bass, and very comfortable. Voice and game sounds are adjustable as well as overall volume. Tap power and mute button and extendable boom mic are some smooth touches. When the headset is turned on, it automatically mutes the tv. A feature my wife is very fond of. Nice job, Sony
customer_reviews.author: technodude

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't have realized that game sound could be sooo powerful and clear, had it not been for this product!
customer_reviews.text: This Sony Brand wireless headset is, simply and greatly, AMAZING! There are on-device controls that allows the wearer to easily access and adjust settings, while in-use. Very intuitive. Prepare to be blown-away by the incredible sound reproduction that this headset produces; you'll swear you're playing a completely different game! That's because the depths of the sounds (as designed by the game creator) are now achievable and crystal-clear!
customer_reviews.author: Del S.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these recently to play with Grand Theft Auto, and they work awesome. The bass on these cans is great, and the mic works awesome too. One thing to note, is that on the front left of the headset is the slide button to set audio vs mic input, and you have to slide it down so that you hear other people talking. This headset is truly worth the money, and rumor has it it will be compatible with PS4. Another great Sony product that I'm glad I spent the money on!
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: A must have with PS3
customer_reviews.text: The product is a must have for the PS3, the sound experience on games and movies is priceless.It allows me to enjoy gaming and movies at all hours of the night with perfect quality. Thank you Sony. Thank you Amazon, you are proving that Capitalism in the right hands works. More companies (American)should model there business the Amazon way getting the best product for the best price. I am completely sold on your company and will not buy anything with out consulting Amazon first.
customer_reviews.author: celticunion

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband for Christmas and I must say he loves them. This was my favorite gift as well even though it was not for me. The only sound I hear is my husband talking to with the players online (as if he's talking on the phone). There is no sound at all from the T.V. I was able to listen as well we both were blown away from the quality of the sound. The headphones sounds just like you're in the movie theater...Very high tech, absolutely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Vontoya

customer_reviews.title: Good product, better with less electronics around?
customer_reviews.text: Good product that works most of the time. The reason I say this is because from time to time it cut out and comes back on about 5-10 seconds later. I don't know what causes this but it could be all of the other wireless things in my living room. With a router, 1 tablet, 2 cell phones, 2 laptops and a wireless surround sound system there is most likely interferences so thats why I am givinf it 4 stars not lower.
customer_reviews.author: roe

customer_reviews.title: great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who says these are not awesome are lying. I'm surprised Sony didn't charge a higher price because the quality is amazing. I wouldn't use these in public because they look silly (get a set of Beyerdynamic DT 770 PRO, 80 ohms for that), but for gaming its awesome. And they even work on my PC/Mac (null on xbox) for added Vent amusement. Downside (yep): the USB dongle. OK its wireless and all that, i just hope i dont lose the thing!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great! But, it didn't work with Rocksmith.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these headphones. Mostly for the ease of use combined with it's performance. For FPS, it's ok. I maybe got an extra kill every once in a while because I was wearing them. I really got it took keep the "noise" of my video games to myself. The "plug and play" ability was awesome. I wrote this for the very small percentage of gamers who play Rocksmith. They do not work together, so I sent them back. I'm not sure why they don't, but you can google it to see other Rocksmith players experiences.
customer_reviews.author: finfam

customer_reviews.title: Better then turtle beach
customer_reviews.text: Iv'e had these since september of last year that's what 9 months from the day i got them i reviewed this late because i thought they were going to brake 3 months later like the Turtle Beach PX11 i bought back in january of last year that didn't even last 3 months well now back to the Sony Wireless Headset iv'e literally dropped these twice by accident and still work perfectly sound is great and they're not made out of cheap plastic like some other gaming headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Marc C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality for $99
customer_reviews.text: I just got done playing a 2 hour session (MW2 and Dead Space 2) and I've got to say this headset is really good! This is only my second headset with the Turtle Beach PX21 as my first ones. The Sony headset beats the PX21 by a mile! The headset feels comfortable around my ears. The sound quality is crisp and clear and has no humming sound unlike the PX21s. Another advantage is that the Sony headset is wireless. For $99 this is the best headset you can get for the PS3. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: arabena

customer_reviews.title: push the top of the left side to turn on
customer_reviews.text: You can wait for the next iteration, "The Pulse" and it will probably be better, but it will cost roughly twice as much. This thing works great. The instructions kind of point to the surround button for turning it on. You turn it on by pushing in the top of the left side of the headphones. The large black rectangle. You'll hear the games much better and not disturb anyone while playing. I find the bass quite sufficient. It works with my pc too.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: best wireless headset for the PS3
customer_reviews.text: Although this product is not Bluetooth I have to say, I was not a bit disappointed in these headsets. It comes with a wireless adapter that easily connects to the USB port for easy use, all of the controls for your volumes are all on the left ear side which make everything easy to reach. These headsets are true 7.1 virtual surround sound and perfect for FPS games as they allow you to hear people coming from any direction. Clear and crisp Mic talking to partners and friends with no static sounds, truly the best of the best for the cheap price you get these for.
customer_reviews.author: RetroSephiroth313

customer_reviews.title: Great sound; limited range
customer_reviews.text: For the purpose of playing video games on the PS3, this is a great headset: crystal clear sound, dynamic range, user friendly control. Only thing is the effective range - if moving away 20 feet from the console, or through a few dry walls, the signal will be lost or blocked. Anyway, no one is moving away from the console that often during game play, so that is not a problem. Overall a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Starkid

customer_reviews.title: Meh.  Works but is clunky on the head
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it was a Sony product and was wireless. I don't understand why in 2012 people would buy - or even MAKE - headsets with cords, but there it is. They work well, the sound is very good and easy to control via the controls on the side. The one downside to this product is that it is pretty heavy on the head and gives me a headache after playing for a while. it's also plastic/vinyl feeling so it gets hot on the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Derek A. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nice headset but the mic broke within a month. It still works but I had to tape it to the headset and it can no longer slide. Sony would not cover this under warranty although there was no neglect on my part. The mic is made too fragile to be adjustable. Disappointed with Sony. I would have expected a little more for $100 but they have so much business that my bad experience doesn't matter to them.
customer_reviews.author: jacksoc7

customer_reviews.title: Good for Budget Gamers
customer_reviews.text: If you need a versatile headset (PC/PS3) and you don't have enough to spend more than $100... I highly recommend this headset. It has decent sound and the voice quality is clear. The only downsides for this headset for me are: The fact that it is hard to travel with and when using it on PC it is a bit harder to mute/unmute. Also, it can be snug. If you like loose-fitting headsets, this isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen KE

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and works great
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and it's awesome. The microphone seems to work great, it's comfortable and the sound is great and easy to adjust. Another awesome feature is that you can use this while it's plugged in and charging. You need a pretty long USB cord, but amazon sells those for pretty cheap and it's worth it to not have to wait around while this thing charges if it starts to die in the middle of a gaming session.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kester

customer_reviews.title: love the headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great, I have a family member who head gets loud if their a lot of noise and boy I put these on and I can barley hear what she talking about. It takes the sound from the tv right to head phone no installing anything. I really enjoy these and will be buying this again when the pair I have dies. it does seems to have an issue with skyrim once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mehl

customer_reviews.title: bad to the bone
customer_reviews.text: i got my headset on sale here on amazon, it's been a year and my headset is still working in perfect condition. i've owned turtle beach headset before, and the lifespan is extremely short. keep in mind, it connects via blutooth, no discomfort on the ears, you can also connect with your pc and the price compare to others is unmatchable. super happy with my purschase and would recommend to anyone. also it's made by sony !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my windows machine, the mike is eons better than on the cheap Big Lots headsets I was using for teamspeak3. Minus one star for cheap feeling plastic, not cheap like it will crack under normal use but cheap like not meant for angry gamer syndrome. Controls are easy to operate while wearing the headset, and it is vey comfortable after extended use (although will make your ears sweaty).
customer_reviews.author: Sebastien Maximilien

customer_reviews.title: Works great but...
customer_reviews.text: This works great and easy on a PS3. No setup just plug in wait a second and boom ready to go. Also it lets you adjust whether you'd rather hear more of another persons voice and it will turn the game down. or vice versa. The only down side is when i tried connecting to my laptop, i can get the sound through the headset, but i cannot get the mic to work on the headset. It only picks it up through the laptop mic and not the headset mic, other than that this is a perfect headset.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: A headset that rivals turtlebeach headsets!
customer_reviews.text: 7.1 surround thumping deep bass into your head without disturbing the neighbors or family.The quality of sound has made my home theater system collect dust, because that same rumble i love when things go boom is captured in the headset! With my home theater system, In order for me to achieve the same bass, i have to crank that puppy loud. Playing games with the "virtual surround" on, is AMAZING! I have reversed so many kills by actually hearing the person sneak up behind me!! And though works well for movies/media, it is made more for (games).
customer_reviews.author: FCF Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Nice head phones
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sound is great, the headphones also help block out outside noise. I've tested them out on movies and competitive games and not once did they wear on my ears or feel heavy on my head. The only thing I can think of that is a slight downfall is that all buttons are on the same side not spread out but it isn't that bothersome and doesn't affect use very much. Just know that it doesn't come with a charging cable you have to use your controller cable. Good for anyone looking for good headphones at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason ramsbottom

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Ease of use, fingertip controls, telescoping microphone, muted TV audio, crystal clear audio, equalizer, voice audio sounds as if the person you are speaking to is sitting next to you, wireless good for at least 30 feet. Cons: Volume control could be more sensitive. Gamers will love these phones. I bought a set, and, after one use, I immediately purchased a set for my son. He lives a couple of hundred miles away and it's a great way for him and I to converse while we're gaming.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy even having sensitive ears
customer_reviews.text: I used these headphones when I am gaming online. They are very comfortable and they don't hurt after wearing them for a long time. I had califlower ear on both sides when I was younger and I can't wear must earbuds or keep the earmuffs on for very long, but these headphone don't bother me. So you have something similar to my condition this is good buy with earphone. Well, I hoping atleast!
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: Wireless capabilities that work with anything your bluetooth dongle can fit into! Used it for my laptop for skype, music, and ps3 for voice chat. Great audio quality, good sound and it last! Had it for a year before misuse has ended it's long reign over my headset life at home :(. Great buy for the price. You won't be disappointed. Fits like a glove! the earcups wrap around your ears. Easy side controls for mute, volume, chat/audio balance. Only problem is that these can't increase/decrease audio/voice chat separately. You can only have more voice sound and completely mute game audio or vice versa. Minor inconvenience, but I got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ya

customer_reviews.title: They are fairly comfortable. They have good distance
customer_reviews.text: I bought these over a year ago and use them nearly on a daily basis. The sound is awsome. They are fairly comfortable. They have good distance. Battery life on full charge will get you thru three movies easy. Only slight downside is how bulky they are, not heavy just large. So unless your trying to win a fashion show they are a great buy. Unless you like to advertise your tech savvy purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Blidso

customer_reviews.title: Great for the average user
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset as I was wanting something wireless that would work for gaming and movies and wasn't too expensive so this seemed to fit the bill. I am a bit of an audiophile, but nothing to over the top and I must say, these headphones seemed perfect for me. The sound is great in my opinion. The bass is great and everything sounded real clear. For an average person, I think these headphones will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Lopezzi

customer_reviews.title: I know it's refurbished but can you at least clean ...
customer_reviews.text: I know it's refurbished but can you at least clean them up a little befor you charged people top dollarthe inside ear pads looks nasty and the fake leather on one ear is mostly gone but on the plus side once you clean them they sound and work good
customer_reviews.author: John j sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great headset.
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset. The surround sound really livens up gaming experience and the online chat is crystal clear. Handy sliders allow you to adjust the amount of game volume to chat, as well as a mic mute feature. Pros: WIRELESS (I hate having a completely wireless system and having wires for a headset...) Good sound quality Light and comfortable Cons: Battery life could be a little longer... but still Ok
customer_reviews.author: framp

customer_reviews.title: Nice very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great..great..great.. This item is amazing. It helps you engage deeper and deeper into the game as it captures every sound. It is very comfortable to wear for long hours. The design is very futuristic as well; I wish if the new module has the same/similar design. It is worth the money. I should note that I didn't use it for chatting yet, and wish if the battery life was little bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: The item came on the day it was supposed to in perfect condition with the usb and everything. The sound of the headset is great quality I enjoy using it for late night netflix, crunchyroll or YouTube. I can hear other players perfectly over gameplay and other people can hear me crystal clear as well. the battery of the headset lasts me about 6-8 hours depending if I have the surround sound option on or not. Definitely worth the buy if you are looking for a great headset
customer_reviews.author: Drew

product_meta.title: Wireless Stereo Headset - Playstation 3
product_meta.description: Experience The Ultimate Audio Advantage with the official PS3 Wireless Stereo Headset. Hear the enemy before they see you with 7.1 digital surround sound. Mobilize your squad during intense multiplayer gaming using the highest quality voice chat. Maintain the edge by staying informed with on-screen headset status updates. Get fast access to key buttons like microphone mute and volume control with a simple tap or slide of the finger on the headset. And enjoy hours of in-the-zone comfort with oversized earpads. The official Wireless Stereo Headset for the PS3 system is your new deadliest weapon.
feature_bullets: 7.1 virtual surround sound enables you to hear the enemy before they see you
Easily access headset Volume and Mic Mute controls. Retractable microphone for use only when you need it
Crystal clear conversations to strategize with teammates. Stay informed with exclusive on-screen headset status updates
Built-in rechargeable battery delivers seven hours usage on a single charge. Enjoy your Wireless Stereo Headset on your PC or Mac
Enjoy hi-fidelity sound while watching your favorite movie. Breathable oversized earpads allow for hours of comfortable gameplay

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,197 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
